classDescription.summary: Definition for a file with a loading delay.

description.text: Adds a listener to the file for all events published by the file.
Returns the amount of lines in the content.

field.title: Returns
field.description: Amount of lines within the content.

description.text: Boolean flag if the file exists. Note: Flash has usually some kind of delay with this method that has to be recognized by its implementation.

field.title: Throws
field.description: FileNotLoadedException If nothing has been loaded before.

description.text: Getter for the bytes that has been loaded already. It will return 0 if no bytes have been loaded.

field.title: Returns
field.description: Amount of bytes that has been loaded.

description.text: Getter for the total filesize in bytes.

field.title: Returns
field.description: Total size of the file in bytes.

description.text: Getter for the content of the complete file.
Getter for the content in the specific line of the content. It will return "undefined" if the line doesn't exist. The line will not contain the linebreak.

param.name: line
param.description: Line to get the content of (starting with 0).

field.title: Returns
field.description: The location of the file as loaded with load.

description.text: Boolean flag if the file is loaded.

field.title: Returns
field.description: true if the file is loaded. false if the file is loading or .load wasn't called.

description.text: Boolean flag if the file is loading.

field.title: Returns
field.description: true if the file is loading. false if the file is already loaded or .load wasn't called.

description.text: Loads a file from a location. This method is similar to the MovieClip.load method.

param.name: location
param.description: Location (URL) to of the file to load.
